TextBlock.Text: BEGONIA: We have a problem with the <color=orange>Warp Stabilizer</color>. It requires 50 NEU to activate, but only 20 NEU is being generated.
PROTEA: I don't understand! All the Photovoltaic Trees are fully grown and healthy.
BEGONIA: Weren't Deutzia's notes on the <color=orange>Warp Stabilizer</color> lost somewhere on <color=orange>Hidden Light</color>? We should look there.
PROTEA: There's no time to look on <color=orange>Hidden Light</color>! We have less than 2 days until this star dies! We need to warp as soon as possible!
